title: Crown eSports LF Top or JG for Throwdown eSports Tournament D4+
body:
Looking for a top or jungle player that is willing and able to play in a tournament on Tuesday 6PM AEST. We need a dedicated and competitive player that can play for the night and is flexible with their champion pool.
Minimum rank requirement D4+

If you're interested comment below or add me in game

replies.body: i would like to join but am now plat 1. i was up to chall last season.
